TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpCookieCollection extends System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class HttpCookieCollection Inherits NameObjectCollectionBase

summary.span: HTTP 쿠키를 조작하기 위한 형식이 안전한 방법을 제공합니다.

span.span: Provides a type-safe way to manipulate HTTP cookies.

remarks.format: ## Examples 다음 코드 예제에 사용 하 여 쿠키를 읽는 방법을 보여 줍니다는 의 속성을 개체를 사용 하 여 쿠키를 작성를 의 속성을 개체.The following code example demonstrates how to read cookies using the property of the object and write cookies using the property of the object. 속성을 모두 반환 개체입니다.Both properties return objects. 이름이 두 쿠키 중 하나가 `userName` 고 `lastVisit` 하지 않은 HTTP 요청에서 HTTP 응답에 생성 됩니다.If either of two cookies named `userName` and `lastVisit` are not in the HTTP request, then they are created in the HTTP response. 두 쿠키가 있는 경우에 쿠키의 속성이 표시 됩니다.If the two cookies exist, the properties of the cookies are displayed. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.HttpCookieCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpCookieCollection/cs/HttpCookieCollection.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.HttpCookieCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpCookieCollection/vb/HttpCookieCollection.vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 두 내장 쿠키 컬렉션을 포함합니다.ASP.NET includes two intrinsic cookie collections. 통해 액세스할 수 있는 컬렉션 서버에 클라이언트에서 전송 된 쿠키가 들어를 `Cookie` 헤더입니다.The collection accessible through contains cookies transmitted by the client to the server in the `Cookie` header. 통해 액세스할 수 있는 컬렉션 클라이언트에 전송 되는 서버에서 생성 된 쿠키가 들어를 `Set-Cookie` 헤더입니다.The collection accessible through contains cookies generated on the server and transmitted to the client in the `Set-Cookie` header. ## Examples 다음 예제에서는 새 쿠키 컬렉션 개체를 만듭니다 및 클라이언트에서 받은 쿠키를 사용 하 여 채웁니다.The following example creates a new cookie collection object and fills it with the cookies received from the client. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookieCollection.HttpCookieCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.HttpCookieCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookieCollection.HttpCookieCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.HttpCookieCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Add(class System.Web.HttpCookie cookie) cil managed

span.span: The to add to the collection.
Adds the specified cookie to the cookie collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 임의 개수의 쿠키 컬렉션 내에서 응용 프로그램은 내장 함수에서 참조 된 컬렉션만 존재할 수 개체는 클라이언트에 전송 됩니다.Any number of cookie collections can exist within an application, but only the collection referenced by the intrinsic object is sent to the client. 메서드 쿠키 컬렉션에서 중복 된 쿠키를 허용 합니다.The method allows duplicate cookies in the cookie collection. 사용 된 쿠키 컬렉션에서 쿠키의 고유성을 보장 하는 방법입니다.Use the method to ensure the uniqueness of cookies in the cookie collection. ## Examples 다음 예제에서는 새 쿠키 컬렉션을 만들고 "LastVisit" 라는 새 쿠키를 쿠키의 값을 현재 날짜 및 시간으로 설정 하는, 및 쿠키 새 컬렉션에 추가 합니다.The following example creates a new cookie collection and a new cookie named "LastVisit", sets the value of the cookie to the current date and time, and adds the cookie to the new collection. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Add Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Add Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AllKeys As String()
public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ AllKeys { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 쿠키 컬렉션의 모든 키(쿠키 이름)가 들어 있는 문자열 배열을 가져옵니다.

span.span: Gets a string array containing all the keys (cookie names) in the cookie collection.
An array of cookie names.

remarks.format: ## Examples 다음 예제에서는 클라이언트의 쿠키 컬렉션에서 쿠키의 이름이 포함 된 문자열 배열을 만듭니다.The following example creates a string array containing the names of the cookies in a client's cookie collection. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookieCollection.AllKeys Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.AllKeys Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookieCollection.AllKeys Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.AllKeys Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Clear() cil managed

span.span: Clears all cookies from the cookie collection.

remarks.format: ## Examples 다음 예제에서는 쿠키 컬렉션에서 모든 쿠키를 삭제합니다.The following example deletes all cookies from a cookie collection. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Clear Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Clear Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Clear Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Clear Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (Array dest, int index);
.method public hidebysig instance void CopyTo(class System.Array dest, int32 index) cil managed
Public Sub CopyTo (dest As Array, index As Integer)
public: void CopyTo(Array ^ dest, int index);

span.span: The destination .
The index of the destination array where copying starts.

summary.span: 지정된 배열 인덱스에서 시작하는 에 쿠키 컬렉션 멤버를 복사합니다.

span.span: Copies members of the cookie collection to an beginning at the specified index of the array.

remarks.format: ## Examples 다음 예제에서는 새 배열 개체에 전체 쿠키 컬렉션을 복사합니다.The following example copies the entire cookie collection into a new Array object. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookieCollection.CopyTo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.CopyTo Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookieCollection.CopyTo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.CopyTo Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Returns an individual object from the cookie collection.

summary.span: 이 속성은 이름 또는 숫자 인덱스로 쿠키를 검색할 수 있도록 오버로드됩니다.

span.span: This property is overloaded to allow retrieval of cookies by either name or numerical index.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.HttpCookie Get(int32 index) cil managed
Public Function Get (index As Integer) As HttpCookie

span.span: The index of the cookie to return from the collection.

summary.span: 쿠키 컬렉션에서 지정된 인덱스에 해당하는 항목을 반환합니다.

span.span: Returns the item with the specified index from the cookie collection.
The specified by .

remarks.format: ## Examples 다음 예제에서는 반환 각 쿠키 쿠키 컬렉션에서 "LastVisit"에 이름이 있는지 여부를 확인 하 고, "LastVisit"가 있으면 해당 값을 현재 날짜 및 시간으로 업데이트.The following example returns each cookie from the cookie collection, checks whether it is named "LastVisit", and, if "LastVisit" is found, updates its value to the current date and time. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.HttpCookie Get(string name) cil managed
Public Function Get (name As String) As HttpCookie

span.span: The name of the cookie to retrieve from the collection.

summary.span: 쿠키 컬렉션에서 지정한 이름의 쿠키를 반환합니다.

span.span: Returns the cookie with the specified name from the cookie collection.
The specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 명명 된 쿠키 존재 하지 않는 경우이 메서드는 해당 이름을 가진 새 쿠키를 만듭니다.If the named cookie does not exist, this method creates a new cookie with that name. ## Examples 다음 예제에서는 새로운 쿠키 컬렉션에 클라이언트에서 보낸 쿠키 컬렉션을 캡처하고, "LastVisit" 이라는 새 컬렉션에서 쿠키를 검색 및 쿠키의 값을 현재 날짜 및 시간으로 업데이트 합니다.The following example captures the cookie collection sent by the client into a new cookie collection, retrieves the cookie named "LastVisit" from the new collection, and updates the cookie's value to the current date and time. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string GetKey(int32 index) cil managed
Public Function GetKey (index As Integer) As String

span.span: The index of the key to retrieve from the collection.

summary.span: 지정된 숫자 인덱스에 있는 쿠키의 키(이름)를 반환합니다.

span.span: Returns the key (name) of the cookie at the specified numerical index.
The name of the cookie specified by .

remarks.format: ## Examples 다음 예제에서는 반환 각 쿠키 쿠키 컬렉션에서 "LastVisit"에 이름이 있는지 여부를 확인 하 고, "LastVisit"가 있으면 해당 값을 현재 날짜 및 시간으로 업데이트.The following example returns each cookie from the cookie collection, checks whether it is named "LastVisit", and, if "LastVisit" is found, updates its value to the current date and time. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookieCollection.GetKey Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.GetKey Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookieCollection.GetKey Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.GetKey Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets the cookie with the specified name from the cookie collection.

span.span: This property is overloaded to allow retrieval of cookies by either name or numerical index.

The specified by .

The specified by

remarks.format: ## Examples 다음 예제에서는 "LastVisit" 이름의 쿠키를 가져오고 해당 값을 추출 합니다.The following example gets the cookie with the name "LastVisit" and extracts its value. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookieCollection.this Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.this Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookieCollection.this Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.this Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Remove(string name) cil managed

span.span: The name of the cookie to remove from the collection.
Removes the cookie with the specified name from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 하는 경우 지정 된 쿠키 `name` 존재 하지 않는 컬렉션에서 예외가 throw 되지 않습니다.If a cookie with the specified `name` does not exist in the collection, no exception is thrown. ## Examples 다음 예제에서는 컬렉션에서 쿠키를 제거합니다.The following example removes a cookie from the collection. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Remove Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Remove Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Remove Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Remove Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Set(class System.Web.HttpCookie cookie) cil managed

span.span: The object to update.

summary.span: 쿠키 컬렉션에 있는 기존 쿠키의 값을 업데이트합니다.

span.span: Updates the value of an existing cookie in a cookie collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 메서드는 먼저 경우 쿠키 이미 컬렉션에 존재 하 고 업데이트를 확인 합니다.The method first checks to see if a cookie already exists in the collection and if so updates it. 메서드 쿠키 컬렉션에서 중복 된 쿠키를 허용 하지 않습니다.The method does not allow duplicate cookies in the cookie collection. 쿠키 컬렉션에서 중복 된 쿠키를 추가 하려면 사용 된 메서드.To add duplicate cookies in the cookie collection, use the method. ## Examples 다음 예제에서는 기존 쿠키의 값을 업데이트 합니다.The following example updates the value of an existing cookie. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Set Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Set Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Set Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Set Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
